page.title: 08Occupation in Rawreth.
page.content: 50 Rawreth residents were asked for their jobs.These were then classified as primary,secondary and tertiary.The results were,primary 2,secondary 12, tertiary 36.It was not surprising that most jobs were tertiary or services;it reflects the balance found in develop- -ed countries.What was surprising was the high amount,72%.It would seem that this part of Essex has a high order of services.The type of jobs were nurse, teacher and lorry driver.There were fewer secondary jobs than expected. This may show that manufacturing is not as important in this area as else- -where.Secondary jobs included making electrical components,carpentry and printing.There were only 2 primary jobs,both nurserymen.This is not surprising as the industry in this part of Essex is important.The soil is excellent, and the population growing.
